---
title: "Apple Stock Price"
format: html
---


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```

Attaching package: 'dplyr'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    filter, lag
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
```
:::


## Load CSV


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- read_csv("data/stock_prices.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 122545 Columns: 17
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr   (1): ticker
dbl  (14): open, high, low, close, adj_close, volume, sma20, sma50, bb_upper...
dttm  (1): created_at
date  (1): date

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::


## Fix Excel date column


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df$date <- as.Date(df$date, origin = "1899-12-30")
```
:::


## Filter Apple


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aapl <- df %>% filter(ticker == "AAPL")
```
:::


## Plot closing price


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(aapl, aes(x = date, y = close)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue", linewidth = 1) +
  labs(
    title = "Apple (AAPL) Closing Price",
    x = "Date",
    y = "USD"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](visualization_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
